item.title: Cluster analysis: wear your seatbelts
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 4 The relationship between the education index and R downloads 5 Results 6 Conclusion 1 Summary To see the all the code used in this post, visit my GitHub repository for this site Objectives: To find what what kind of clusters are there in the seatbelts dataset. Challenge: To implement a clustering algorithm for the first time. Data points: 294,912 Language: R 2 Question What types of clusters are there in the seatbelts dataset?
